tasks.name: {"title":"Omelette méditerranéenne aux tomates","ingredients":[{"quantity":"4","unit":"pièces","name":"œufs"},{"quantity":"1","unit":"tasse","name":"riz","preparation":"cuit"},{"quantity":"2","unit":"pièces","name":"tomates","preparation":"coupées en dés"}],"steps":[{"id":"1","description":"Laver les tomates sous l'eau froide.","duration_minutes":1,"dependencies":[]},{"id":"2","description":"Couper les tomates en dés.","duration_minutes":2,"dependencies":["1"]},{"id":"3","description":"Casser les œufs dans un bol.","duration_minutes":1,"dependencies":[]},{"id":"4","description":"Battre les œufs avec une fourchette jusqu'à obtenir un mélange homogène.","duration_minutes":1,"dependencies":["3"]},{"id":"5","description":"Chauffer une poêle antiadhésive à feu moyen.","duration_minutes":2,"dependencies":[]},{"{"
